title: Newbie / Font Test Drive
content:
Hi guys,

I am trying some fonts for a Literary Magazine. Do you know of any Indesign Template or Website that i could a get a template then copy/paste a specific font and take to the laser printer to check how the font works? A fast test drive for fonts which include its family' variations for text.

I guess is something like that  
 [http://www.levien.com/type/atf\_1912/p0739\_sm.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110116184846/http:/www.levien.com/type/atf_1912/p0739_sm.jpg "http://www.levien.com/type/atf\_1912/p0739\_sm.jpg")

or that  
 [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/TitilliumText14L](http://web.archive.org/web/20110116184846/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/TitilliumText14L "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/TitilliumText14L")  
 [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/ChunkFive](http://web.archive.org/web/20110116184846/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/ChunkFive "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/ChunkFive")

I guess i could do it by hand with each font but it will take me quite a while.

Any help or ideas?

Thanks  
Sebastian
author: uzapucax
